item.description:
Event Details:
The 25th Springfest at the Beach featuring chili cook-off,hot dogs, live entertainment (the Rhythm Method Band), and over 130 craft brews, micro brews and imports from all over the world. Enjoy the ambience of Ocean Beach Park on the water. All inclusive. Food, live entertainment, 15 beer tasting tickets, brewery reps and the ambience of Ocean Beach Park. $30 contribution at the gate, $25 in advance. Benefits the New London Rotary Foundation, Inc. No one under 21 admitted. Positive ID required.

Glenn has graciously accepted the role of NHC contact for this event. Please do not hesitate to call him in regards to this event. His phone number is noted in his RSVP.

To purchase tickets:
http://www.localwinee...

Carpooling encouraged :D
item.name: Springfest at the Beach (Beer Tasting)
